title: M365 Shared Mailboxes disappear with 115.* Unified folders view
content:
I have a number of M365 accounts, including a number of "Shared mailboxes"

Yesterday, I migrated from Thunderbird 102.13.1 to 115.0.1 (Supernova), and with the new version, in the Unified Folders view, the Inboxes of the "Shared mailboxes" do not show up. If I switch to All Folders view, the Inboxes are in the correct place under each account.

Please advise as I cannot see the shared mailbox inboxes in Unified view and I cannot roll back to the previous version.
creator: scott.peron

title: thunderbird on windows 11
content:
After downloading an email from my gmail account thunderbird uses 90% of ram and is essentially frozen. Initially after starting Thunderbird is not responding followed by a slow increase in ram usage to about 90% is ibserved. Tried uninstall and install; but not change in behaviour. Any suggestions of how to repair would be welcome.

Thank You,
creator: mmarconi

title: Time Warner SMTP settings
content: Cannot send emails using twc.mail.com This is an SMTP server. Have tried several ports, but none seem to work. Message is "Sending of message failed.The message could not be sent because the connection to the Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.twc.com was lost in the middle of the transaction. Try again.
creator: ahartley317
